Skill.SkillDesc: The Restoration spell is an ancient variation upon the more familiar Healing spell. Thought lost to the march of magical progress, it has only recently been rediscovered. Because the bulk of its healing power takes place gradually over time, it is less popular for emergency triage healers or impatient wizards, but it was once applied to warriors in advance of long and arduous combat. The spell can even recover the target from certain ailments at higher levels of usage. The one caveat is that the spell only recovers HP and does not help for healing injuries.

Skill.ClosedDesc: This ability is used only by Fomors to summon and command the living dead.
Skill.SkillDesc: This ability is used only by Fomors to summon and command the living dead.

Skill.ClosedDesc: A mysterious skill that allows you to phase through the shadows and appear behind your enemy.

Skill.SkillDesc: An advanced form of Thunder that only a Master Druid or a powerful Dragon can use. By casting this spell, you can temporarily wrest control of the weather itself to call down lightning, smiting enemies in a wide area.

Skill.ClosedDesc: A special power that only an archer of legend can use. Fires arrows at all enemies within range at once.

Skill.SkillDesc: Unleash the power of dragons with this explosive skill, setting the ground around you alight with a physical attack and blowing back nearby enemies. Its force increases with high Mana, Intelligence, and a well-trained Firebolt.
